channel.title: Fed rate cuts on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Fed rate cuts on FinanClub

item.title: NEM
item.description: score:16 Chances: Gold producers such as Newmont and Barrick Gold are increasing investments in copper to gain influence over the commodity. S&P 500 posted gains heading into the holiday break amid expectations of Fed rate cuts next year. Caterpillar demonstrates its first battery electric underground mining truck, in line with providing sustainable choices for the industry.
